instructions: Divide dough into 24 pieces. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Dip each piece of dough into butter mixture; place in a 10-in. fluted tube pan coated with nonstick cooking spray. Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour. Bake at 375 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf frozen bread dough, thawed
title: Onion-Garlic Bubble Bread
